Text:
I saw them live in Milan and they were absolutely fantastic !
I haven't heard them on a record but, I guess they sound alright even ways.

Don't know what you think of it? It's pure fucking win is what it is.

I love the gallows. The drums are great!

Don't know what u think? the album and the band are fuckin ace, best liveshow i ever been to, and it even works on a record. Check out comeback kid for further punk/hardcore-enjoyment
